title: Dedicated Tips page (drinking-water tips) with navigation access

requirements.summary: Add a new lazy-loaded /tips route and register it in the TanStack Router route tree.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /tips renders a Tips page without errors.
The page is code-split (lazy-loaded) consistently with other non-landing pages (e.g., FeedPage).
The new route is included in the router's routeTree (frontend/src/App.tsx).

file_operations.description: Register a new "/tips" route in the TanStack Router routeTree, using React.lazy + Suspense like other non-landing pages to ensure consistent code-splitting behavior.

requirements.summary: Implement a readable, responsive Tips page UI that displays the provided hydration tips in English using existing UI components and Tailwind styling.
acceptanceCriteria:
The Tips page displays the following tips as a list:
- Drink when you feel thirsty.
- Keep a reusable water bottle with you.
- Start your day with a glass of water.
- Add lemon, cucumber or berries for flavor.
- Choose water over sugary drinks.
- Eat water‑rich foods like melon or cucumbers.
- Aim for pale‑yellow urine as a hydration guide.
- Sip water during meals.
- Set small reminders if you forget to drink.
The page has a clear page title (e.g., "Hydration Tips") and uses consistent spacing/typography with the rest of the site.
The page renders well on mobile and desktop widths (no horizontal overflow; text remains legible).

file_operations.description: Create the Tips page view with an English title (e.g., "Hydration Tips") and a responsive layout that renders the provided tips as a readable list using existing UI components (e.g., Card) and Tailwind utility classes (no changes to frontend/src/components/ui).

requirements.summary: Add public navigation links to /tips in both the desktop header navigation and the mobile navigation drawer.
acceptanceCriteria: A "Tips" link is visible in the desktop navigation and navigates to /tips.
A "Tips" link is visible in the mobile navigation drawer and navigates to /tips, closing the drawer after navigation.
The Tips link does not require authentication (it is available regardless of login state).

file_operations.description: Add a "Tips" Link to the desktop header navigation that is always visible (not gated by authentication/admin state) and routes to "/tips".
Add a "Tips" Link to the mobile navigation drawer that is always visible (not gated by authentication/admin state) and calls onClose on click so the drawer closes after navigating to "/tips".

requirements.summary: Style the Tips page to match the existing warm “Golden Water” aesthetic using existing Tailwind theme tokens and layout patterns.
acceptanceCriteria: The Tips page uses the existing design system primitives (Tailwind + existing UI components) and does not introduce a conflicting color palette.
The page looks visually integrated with the current LandingPage/AppLayout styling (cards, typography, spacing, and background treatments align).

file_operations.description: Refine Tips page styling to align with the existing Golden Water theme (use existing Tailwind theme tokens/classes such as background/card/muted/primary, consistent container widths, spacing, and typography), keeping the page visually consistent with AppLayout/LandingPage patterns.
